name: Battle Room Beta
description:
BATTLE ROOM BETA offers an immersive online multiplayer TPS shooter experience, completely free as a beta version. No daily maintenance, installation or complex configuration required: Just start the game! As simple as opening a door, incredibly easy to get into the action!

Non-stop adrenaline-filled excitement awaits you in different battle rooms where 2 teams will face each other! Players will be able to enjoy high-quality graphics even on very low-end devices!



KEY FEATURES


  • Limited edition characters with unique abilities for the beta version, but with fairly balanced gameplay.





  • 2 different levels that present familiar objects and interesting environments for exploration.
  • Continuous weapon discoveries and utilization for strategic advantage.
  • Cross-platform playability between PC and mobile devices, supporting multiple languages.

FUTURE UPDATES


In the near future, BATTLE ROOM will introduce:

  • 2 additional game modes.
  • Over 10 new levels and 20 additional characters for expanded gameplay.
  • Character customization options for personalization.
  • Features like ranking systems, achievements, and new items for enrichment.
  • A diverse array of unique weapons to unlock and master.
  • New abilities like climbing and dodging bullets.
